job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In the role of Conversational AI developer you're part of a team that strives for the best customer-experience in online banking contact. You'll be part of an environment that heavily focusses on innovation by means of cutting-edge technologies, such as Generative AI! Together, you'll be responsible for how customers get into contact with the bank on a large scale, working on an application landscape that supports over thirty thousand customer calls every day. Think of, for example, continuously improving our voicebot to better serve our customers when they call us, using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features.

   Create an Impact
     * "The end-user is always number one!" In the back of your head, you're always keeping this in mind. You strive to come up with ways to continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank;
     * You use the latest development technologies and would love to share your stack with us. You're constantly eager to experiment with- and learn new techniques;
     * Together with the team (DevOps, Product Owner, Business Analyst, UX designer, Scrum Master and architect) you'll devise practical solutions. You'll have an active role in participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team;
     * You don't mind picking up test-automation and test-management activities;
     * You ensure that we continuously improve in terms of code quality and architecture.
     * You have fun in everything you do!

   Your Skills includes:

   To be considered for this role, you must at least have demonstratable experience with:
     * CI/ CD Pipelines (Azure DevOps, including biceps)
     * MS Azure
     * MS Power Virtual Agents / Copilot Studio

   Nice to have:
     * MS Power Automate
     * MS Speech Services
     * Azure DevOps
     * Azure networking & security
     * Dynatrace
     * Splunk
     * Nexus IQ
     * Sonar
     * AudioCodes
     * Understanding on Genesys Cloud or other CCAAS-application capabilities
     * AWS
     * Cyber ARK
     * Checkmarx
     * Kong platformMicro services
     * SM9
job_details.full_text:
Conversational AI Developer

In the role of Conversational AI developer you're part of a team that strives for the best customer-experience in online banking contact. You'll be part of an environment that heavily focusses on innovation by means of cutting-edge technologies, such as Generative AI! Together, you'll be responsible for how customers get into contact with the bank on a large scale, working on an application landscape that supports over thirty thousand customer calls every day. Think of, for example, continuously improving our voicebot to better serve our customers when they call us, using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features.

   Create an Impact
     * "The end-user is always number one!" In the back of your head, you're always keeping this in mind. You strive to come up with ways to continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank;
     * You use the latest development technologies and would love to share your stack with us. You're constantly eager to experiment with- and learn new techniques;
     * Together with the team (DevOps, Product Owner, Business Analyst, UX designer, Scrum Master and architect) you'll devise practical solutions. You'll have an active role in participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team;
     * You don't mind picking up test-automation and test-management activities;
     * You ensure that we continuously improve in terms of code quality and architecture.
     * You have fun in everything you do!

   Your Skills includes:

   To be considered for this role, you must at least have demonstratable experience with:
     * CI/ CD Pipelines (Azure DevOps, including biceps)
     * MS Azure
     * MS Power Virtual Agents / Copilot Studio

   Nice to have:
     * MS Power Automate
     * MS Speech Services
     * Azure DevOps
     * Azure networking & security
     * Dynatrace
     * Splunk
     * Nexus IQ
     * Sonar
     * AudioCodes
     * Understanding on Genesys Cloud or other CCAAS-application capabilities
     * AWS
     * Cyber ARK
     * Checkmarx
     * Kong platformMicro services
     * SM9

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on developing conversational AI applications using Generative AI, including improving voicebots with NLP and GenAI features. It emphasizes building and deploying user-facing systems, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases.phrase: strives for the best customer-experience in online banking contact
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the business context and the goal of improving customer experience in a specific domain (online banking contact).

phrases.phrase: continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank
phrases.justification: This highlights the need to align technical work with broader business goals and objectives.

phrases.phrase: how customers get into contact with the bank on a large scale
phrases.justification: This shows an understanding of the scale and business impact of the systems being developed.

phrases.phrase: using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features
phrases.justification: This directly mentions the use of Generative AI and NLP, which are core to modeling tasks in this domain.

phrases.phrase: continuously improving our voicebot
phrases.justification: Improving a voicebot involves adapting and refining underlying models for better performance.

phrases.phrase: Conversational AI developer
phrases.justification: The title itself implies the development of software applications focused on conversation.

phrases.phrase: working on an application landscape that supports over thirty thousand customer calls every day
phrases.justification: This indicates the development of production-grade, user-facing software systems that handle significant load.

phrases.phrase: Micro services
phrases.justification: Microservices architecture is a common pattern in modern software development for building scalable applications.

phrases.phrase: CI/ CD Pipelines (Azure DevOps, including biceps)
phrases.justification: CI/CD pipelines are a fundamental component of MLOps for automating deployment and integration.

phrases.phrase: Azure DevOps
phrases.justification: Azure DevOps is a platform that supports MLOps practices, including CI/CD, testing, and deployment.

phrases.phrase: test-automation and test-management activities
phrases.justification: Testing and management are crucial aspects of ensuring the reliability and quality of deployed systems, aligning with MLOps.

phrases.phrase: code quality and architecture
phrases.justification: Ensuring code quality and architecture are key operational concerns for maintaining production systems.

phrases.phrase: Together with the team (DevOps, Product Owner, Business Analyst, UX designer, Scrum Master and architect) you'll devise practical solutions.
phrases.justification: This highlights collaboration with a multidisciplinary team to achieve practical outcomes.

phrases.phrase: You'll have an active role in participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team
phrases.justification: This indicates active participation in technical discussions and sharing input/advice, which requires communication skills.

phrases.phrase: You use the latest development technologies and would love to share your stack with us.
phrases.justification: This shows an interest in current technologies and sharing knowledge, implying a continuous learning mindset.

phrases.phrase: You're constantly eager to experiment with- and learn new techniques
phrases.justification: This directly states a desire to experiment with and learn new techniques, a core aspect of adaptability.

phrases.phrase: you'll devise practical solutions.
phrases.justification: This emphasizes finding practical solutions to problems.

phrases.phrase: You don't mind picking up test-automation and test-management activities
phrases.justification: Willingness to take on diverse tasks like test automation and management shows a pragmatic approach to ensuring system quality.

phrases.phrase: strives for the best customer-experience
phrases.justification: A focus on customer experience and continuous improvement suggests an innovative and ownership-driven mindset.

phrases.phrase: environment that heavily focusses on innovation by means of cutting-edge technologies, such as Generative AI!
phrases.justification: This highlights a focus on innovation and the use of cutting-edge technologies.
